src:
Gordić: Dobijali smo kao tim, tako i gubimo
Košarkaš Partizana smatra da je Venecija zasluženo slavila u Beogradu

05 Nov 2019

Prvi put ove sezone igrači crno-belih pognute glave su napustili parket u Evrokupu. U Beogradu je Partizanov skalp uspela da uzme Venecija, koja je znatno angažovanijom igrom u reketu uspela da nanese poraz košarkašima Andree Trinkijerija.
Nakon utakmice, košarkaš Partizana, Nemanja Gordić, izjavio je da njegov tim nije dovoljno energetski parirao rivalu, u čemu leži ključ njihove pobede večeras."Loša utakmica za nas. Čak i uz većim delom lošu igru u prvom poluvremenu imali smo aktivan rezultat, ali u nastavku smo potpuno pali, bili smo bez energije. Igrali su bolje, jednostavno rečeno, bolje su šutirali, bolje su trčali i sasvim zasluženo su pobedili", rekao je Gordić.
On je večeras imao nešto lošiji učinak na individualnom planu, ali nije želeo da govori o njemu, već je potencirao da je Partizan danas izgubio timski."Mislim da je suvišno pričati o individualnom učinku nakon ovakve utakmice. Kao i do sada kada smo dobijali, dobijali smo kao tim, pa tako i sad gubimo kao tim i moramo da prihvatimo ovaj poraz, da držimo glavu gore i da idemo dalje".
Logično pitanje nakon poraza bilo je – šta dalje? Nemanja Gordić kaže da će se ekipa sada okrenuti narednoj utakmici i pokušati da što bre zaboravi na lošu partiju i dođe do pobede protiv Zadra za vikend."Dalje je sledeća utakmica. Naporan je raspored. Normalna je stvar, navikli smo se na to, ne znam još uvek kako ćemo putovati za Zadar, ali to je uvek teško gostovanje. Tradicionalno protiv Zadra bude nezgodno, oni su bez pobede u ABA ligi i uvek je teško igrati protiv takvih ekipa, ali nadam se da ćemo do te utakmice uspeti da se konsolidujemo", zaključio je Gordić.







Piše: Srđan TODOROVIĆFoto: Star Sport
text:
Gordic: We won as a team, so we lose
Partizan Basketball player thinks Venice deservedly celebrated in Belgrade

05 Nov 2019

For the first time this season, black-and-white bent-head players have left the floor in Eurocup. In Belgrade, Partizan's scalp was able to take on Venice, who, with a much more engaged racket game, was able to defeat Andrea Trinkieri's basketball players.
After the game, Partizan basketball player Nemanja Gordic said his team did not vigorously parry rivals, which is the key to their victory tonight. "A bad game for us. Even with most of the bad play in the first half, we had an active result, in the sequel we fell completely, we were without energy. They played better, simply put, they kicked better, they ran better and they deservedly won, "Gordic said.
He had a slightly worse effect on the individual plan tonight, but did not want to talk about him, but emphasized that Partizan lost team today. "I think it is superfluous to talk about individual performance after a game like this. we were winning as a team, and so now we are losing as a team and we have to accept this defeat, keep our heads up and move on. "
The logical question after the defeat was - what next? Nemanja Gordic says the team will now turn to the next game and try to forget about the bad game and win against Zadar over the weekend. "Next is the next game. It's a busy schedule. It's a normal thing, we're used to it, no I still know how we will travel to Zadar, but it's always a difficult visit. Traditionally against Zadar it will be difficult, they are without winning the ABA league and it is always difficult to play against such teams, but I hope that by that game we will be able to consolidate ", Gordic concluded.







By: Srdjan TODOROVICPhoto: Star Sport
